@usamiharu I wasn't sure who to respond to, I don't mean to single you out at all. I just wanted to share the reasoning behind a certain opinion so people can have a bit of insight into how others may think. I do agree that people shouldn't go around NTR shaming, I just think that behavior is just a consequence of NTR being a controversial topic. thank you for your understanding

People like @Utsumori is great cause they don't whine alot only commenting when its trully matter but people who keep spaming hating NTR is worse than NTR lover, you don't like NTR, that's fine, but don't fucking SPAM on all NTR doujin, those people trully deserve the special snowflake tittle.
OH YES! finally *Q*
Sooo is this going to end up as NTR cuckshit or what?

@usamiharu People can both enjoy hentai and have empathy, they are not mutually exclusive. I'm not one of the people who posts complaints about NTR (this being my first post here) but I absolutely despise it and avoid NTR like the plague, and that does not make me some "special snowflake". I just happen to be a person who doesn't view sex as immoral, while also being a person who becomes empathetic of characters while reading a story. You might think differently, we are all different, but the way I experience any story is with empathy for the characters as to understand how they feel and why they carry out their actions, as this is how I enjoy it most. 

Perhaps with that bit of insight, you can see why certain people might be disgusted by certain things like NTR without being "special snowflakes" that want a "good image" in on a hentai site of anonymous people. to someone like me,NTR/rape/etc. will always be a matter of being disgusted by the actions of the agitator against a victim.
